creator: pskopek@gmail.com
text:
When Tomcat Web Application Manager displays list of applications (at left side) /host-manager and /manager have broken links resulting in 404 http error.
This could be easily fixed by adding following section to their WEB-INF/web.xml descriptors.

  <welcome-file-list>
     <welcome-file>
        html/
     </welcome-file>
  </welcome-file-list>
 
(after servlet-mapping sections)
*** Bug 48670 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
creator: knst.kolinko@gmail.com
